DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To identify risk factor postoperative mortality within 3 day adult patient undergoing emergency surgery construct predictive model . Methods : This retrospective , exploratory analytical study . All medical record adult patient undergoing emergency surgery January 2013 December 2014 use analyze relevant risk factor use binary logistic regression analysis . A predictive model predict postoperative morbidity within 3 day construct .
